title: 107_hr956
content: Amends part A (TANF) of title IV of the Social Security Act (SSA) to restore the authority of States to transfer up to ten percent of TANF funds to carry out State programs pursuant to SSA title XX for FY 2002. Amends SSA title XX to: (1) restore funds to States and territories for FY 2001 and 2002. And (2) require the Secretary of Health and Human Services to compile information on State activities carried out under SSA title XX and report it annually to Congress.
